[Home](./index.md) &gt; [subito-connector-mysql](./subito-connector-mysql.md) &gt; [Connector](./subito-connector-mysql.connector.md)

## Connector class

Create a new MongoDB connection

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare class Connector 
```

## Example


```
new MongoDBConnector(
   'mongodb://mongodb:27017/',
   'subito',
   {
     authSource: 'admin',
     replicaSet: 'rs0',
   }
);
```
